results.title: Effects of Simvastatin on Fetal Cardiac Impairment in the Diaphragmatic Experimental Hernia Model.
results.text_hl: We hypothesized that antenatal maternal administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and/or @CHEMICAL_Sildenafil_Citrate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068677 @@@sildenafil@@@ might also promote benefits in @DISEASE_Ventricular_Remodeling @DISEASE_MESH:D020257 @@@cardiac remodeling@@@ of @<m>DISEASE_Hernias_Diaphragmatic_Congenital</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D065630 @@@congenital diaphragmatic hernia@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Hernias_Diaphragmatic_Congenital</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D065630 @@@CDH@@@).

citations.NLM: Pelizzo G, Bussani R, Mazzon E, Anfuso C, Lombardi C, Zambelli V, Zandonà L, De Silvestri A, Zennaro F, Calcaterra V. Effects of Simvastatin on Fetal Cardiac Impairment in the Diaphragmatic Experimental Hernia Model. Fetal Diagn Ther. 2019;46(1):28-37. PMID: 30199868
